item.title: about added
item.description: This blog will be a little selfish… my main goal is to be a better programmer. But if You find some values from this blog, i will be a happiest man at the world!! i have started programing at end of 2016, and my first job i got a year later. At the beginning i was working with java, but quickly decide to learn Go, and now i am fulltime Gopher :D
